original_title: A Tímida Luz de Vela das Últimas Esperanças
overview: Two lonely women, who have shared the same roof for decades, the same hurts, snares, anxieties and ghosts of the past. Zizi and Antonieta, like so many other women, are accomplices in a life they did not live and dreamed of living, and, amid hopes and hopelessness, they are alive ... They could be me, you, us, in the very near tomorrow.
title: A Tímida Luz de Vela das Últimas Esperanças
